title: Play UI
desc: The resilient, jQuery-inspired DOM and UI abstraction library, and a futuristic CSS framework. Play UI is everything for the modern UI.

features.title: Succint APIs
features.desc: We really love the succintness of the jQuery library, so we brought the more futuristic Play UI to look and feel like it.

features.title: Async DOM
features.desc: What we want is performance without a virtual DOM! The Async DOM strategy in Play UI lets you build resilient UIs even without knowing it.

features.title: Modular
features.desc: Take as much or as little of Play UI as needed; use as all-in-one ($(el).xyz()) or import individual utilities (import { xyz } from '...').

features.title: Universal
features.desc: Run Play UI both in the browser and in server-side DOM instances. Use alongside the UI technologies or frameoworks of your choice.
